records.name: Support Subscription
records.description: A long-term support subscription for on-premise installations.

records.name: No Friends
records.description:
• Personal account with email, calendaring and much more
  • Kolab Anywhere access with mobile device sync
  • Share folders and data with others on Kolab Now *
  • Hosted and managed entirely within Switzerland
  • A suitable replacement for Gmail, Outlook.com, iCloud and services alike

records.name: Geen Vrienden
records.description:
• Persoonlijk account met email, kalender en meer
  • Overal toegang tot Kolab met uw mobiel
  • Deel mappen met anderen
  • Compleet binnen Zwitserland hosted en beheerd
  • Een geschikte vervaning voor Gmail, Outlook.com, iCloud en andere soortgelijke services

records.name: Party
records.description:
All the features of the Individual Account, plus:

  • Use a domain name which you own
  • Manage any number of users with accounts @<yourdomain>

Final pricing is based on the number of accounts created. You must already own the domain name you wish to use.

records.name: Feestje
records.description:
Alle features van een individueel account, en als extras:

  • Gebruik een eigen domain naam
  • Beheer een willekeurig aantal gebruikeraccounts @<uwdomein>

Uiteindelijke prijs wordt gebaseerd op het aantal gebruikeraccounts. U dient het domein reeds te bezitten.

records.name: Colocated
records.description: The benefits of an on-premise, supported Kolab installation, combined with the features of a hosted and managed deployment, garnished with many additional features.

records.name: Filler
records.description: The benefits of an on-premise, supported Kolab installation, combined with the features of a hosted and managed deployment, garnished with many additional features.

records.name: Other Filler
records.description: The benefits of an on-premise, supported Kolab installation, combined with the features of a hosted and managed deployment, garnished with many additional features.
